item.title: CVE-2023-23681|2024-08-02T10:35:33.667Z -- labib%20ahmed -- image%20hover%20effects%20for%20wpbakery%20page%20builder
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Labib Ahmed Image Hover Effects For WPBakery Page Builder plugin <= 4.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47552|2024-08-02T21:09:37.361Z -- labib%20ahmed -- image%20hover%20effects%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Labib Ahmed Image Hover Effects – WordPress Plugin.This issue affects Image Hover Effects – WordPress Plugin: from n/a through 5.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-30520|2024-06-04T17:39:18.328Z -- labib%20ahmed -- carousel%20anything%20for%20wpbakery%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Labib Ahmed Carousel Anything For WPBakery Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Carousel Anything For WPBakery Page Builder: from n/a through 2.1.
